item.title: TEST 001: Digital Farming Initiative (Market Failure)
item.description:
TEST 001: Digital Farming Initiative (Market Failure)

Summary: Pre-Codex, large-scale asymmetric economic maneuver terminated by market failure. Validated need for stable pipeline (Site Alpha).

Source: Raw Transcripts TXT: Batches 1–2

Notes

  • Keep this as a “card” unless you’re expanding with raw excerpts.
  • When expanding, add 1–3 concrete examples and link back to the relevant protocol.
